Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane Nee Theeruvin Adhipadhiyai Nokki Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Un Irudhayam Mettimaikondu: Naan Dhevan, Naan Samuththiraththin Naduve Dhevaasanaththil Veetrirukkirenendru Nee Solli, Un Irudhayaththai Dhevanin Irudhayaththaippol Aakkinaalum, Nee Manushaneyallaamal Dhevanalla.
3 idho, Dhaaniyelaippaarkkilum Nee Gnaanavaan; Ragasiyamaanadhondrum Unakku Maraiporul Alla.
4 nee Un Gnaanaththinaalum Un Buththiyinaalum Porul Sambaadhiththu, Ponnaiyum Velliyaiyum Un Pokkishasaalaigalil Serththukkondaai.
5 un Viyaabaaraththinaalum Un Magaa Gnaanaththinaalum Un Porulaip Perugappanninaai; Un Irudhayam Un Selvaththinaal Mettimaiyaayitru.
6 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Nee Un Irudhayaththai Dhevanin Irudhayaththaippola Aakkugirapadiyinaal

7 idho, Jaadhigalil Magaa Balavaangalaagiya Marudhesaththaar Unakku Virodhamaai Varappannuven; Avargal Un Gnaanaththin Azhagukku Virodhamaaith Thangal Pattayangalai Uruvi, Un Minukkaik Kulaiththuppoduvaargal.
8 unnaik Kuzhiyile Vizhaththalluvaargal; Nee Samuththirangalin Naduve Kolaiyundu Saagiravargalaippol Saavaai.
9 unnaik Kollugiravanukku Munbaaga: Naan Dhevanendru Nee Solvaayo? Unnaik Kuththippodugiravan Kaikku Nee Manushaneyallaamal Dhevanallave,
10 marudhesaththaarin Kaiyinaal Nee Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargal Saavadhupol Saavaai; Naan Idhai Sonnen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
11 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

12 manupuththirane Nee Theeru Raajaavaikkuriththup Pulambi Avanai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal. Nee Visiththiramaai Seyyappatta Muththiraimodhiram; Nee Gnaanaththaal Niraindhavan; Poorana Azhagullavan.

13 nee Dhevanudaiya Thottamaagiya Edhenil Irundhavan; Padhmaraagam Pushparaagam, Vairam, Padigappachchai, Komedhagam, Yaspi, Indhiraneelam, Maragadham, Maanikkam Mudhalaana Sagalavidha Raththinangalum Ponnum Unnai Moodikkondirukkiradhu Sirushtikkappatta Naalil Un Melavaaththiyangalum Un Naagasurangalum Unnidaththil Aayaththappattirundhadhu.
14 nee Kaappaatrugiradharkaaga Abishegampannappatta Kerub; Dhevanudaiya Parisuththa Parvadhaththil Unnai Vaiththen; Akkinimayamaana Karkalin Naduve Ulaavinaai.
15 nee Sirushtikkappatta Naal Thuvakki Unnil Aniyaayam Kandupidikkappattadhumattum, Un Vazhigalil Kuraiyatrirundhaai.

16 un Viyaabaaraththin Migudhiyinaal, Un Kodumai Adhigariththu Nee Paavancheydhaai; Aagaiyaal Naan Unnai Dhevanudaiya Parvadhaththilirundhu Aagaadhavanendru Thalli, Kaappaatrugira Kerubaai Irundha Unnai Akkinimayamaana Karkalin Naduve Iraadhapadikku Azhiththuppoduven.

17 un Azhaginaal Un Irudhayam Mettimaiyaayitru; Un Minukkinaal Un Gnaanaththaik Keduththaai; Unnaith Tharaiyile Thallippoduven; Raajaakkal Unnaip Paarkkumpadi Unnai Avargalukku Munbaaga Vedikkaiyaakkuven.

18 un Akkiramangalin Eraalaththinaalum, Un Viyaabaaraththin Aneedhaththinaalum Un Parisuththa Sthalangalaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkinaai; Aagaiyaal Unnaip Patchippadhaagiya Oru Akkiniyai Naan Un Naduvilirundhu Purappadappanni, Unnaippaarkkira Ellaarudaiya Kangalukku Munbaagavum Unnai Boomiyinmel Saambalaakkuven.
19 janangalil Unnai Arindha Anaivarum Unnimiththam Thigaippaargal; Magaa Bayangaramaavaai; Ini Orupodhum Irukkamaattaai Endru Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
20 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
21 manupuththirane, Nee Un Mugaththai Seedhonukku Edhiraagath Thiruppi, Adharku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal.

22 karththaraagiya Dhevan Sollugiraar; Seedhone, Idho, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Un Naduvile Magimaippaduven; Naan Adhile Nyaayaththeerppugalai Seydhu, Adhile Parisuththarendru Vilangumpodhu, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.

23 naan Adhile Kollainoyaiyum, Adhin Veedhigalil Raththaththaiyum Varappannuven; Adharku Virodhamaai Sutrilum Vandha Pattayaththinaal Kaayampattavargal Adhin Naduvile Vettundu Vizhuvaargal; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.

24 isravel Vamsaththaarai Igazhndha Avargaludaiya Sutruppuraththaaraagiya Anaivarilum, Inith Thaikkiramullum Novundaakkugira Nerinjilum Avargalukku Iraadhu; Appozhudhu Naan Karththaraagiya Aandavarendru Arindhukolvaargal.

25 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Naan Isravel Vamsaththaarai Avargal Sidharadikkappattirukkira Janangalidaththilirundhu Serththukkonduvandhu, Avargalaal Jaadhigalin Kangalukkumunbaagap Parisuththarendru Vilangumpodhu, Avargal En Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobukku Naan Koduththa Thangaludaiya Dhesaththile Kudiyiruppaargal.

26 avargaludaiya Sutruppuraththaaril Avargalai Igazhndha Anaivarilum Naan Nyaayaththeerppugalai Seyyumpodhu, Avargal Adhile Sugamaaik Kudiyirundhu, Veedugalaik Katti, Dhraatchaththottangalai Naatti, Sugamaai Vaazhndhu Naan Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal Engiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
